comments.body: Quote from: 4ioSan on November 19, 2023, 05:05:48 PMHello my dear friend!I want to create coin with liquid metal (kryptonite).I think you have watch too much movies and read too many comics.Kryptonite is a fictional material, it doesn't existQuoteKryptonite is a fictional material that appears primarily in Superman stories published by DC Comics. Ihttps://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kryptonite

comments.author: 4ioSan
comments.body: Kryptonite consists of cryptocoins only proof of work. We need SatoBridge.We need Open Source decentralized network AI. S6I can't do this, my head hurts a lot.You're right, I love movies and comics.Decentralized Virtual MINT( World)
